DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman , age 18 50 year inclusive ( healthy young subject ) > 65 year inclusive ( elderly subject ) study day 1 . Women nonchildbearing potential may include either surgically sterile ( hysterectomy and/or oophorectomy ) postmenopausal ≥1 year ( estradiol ≤25 pg/mL [ 92 pmol/L ] FSH ≥40 mIU/mL ) must negative serum pregnancy test result within 48 hour administration test article . Women surgically sterile postmenopausal must provide documentation procedure operative report ultrasound negative serum pregnancy test result within 48 hour administration test article . 2 . The elderly subject must generally healthy , may enrol stable , chronic illness , wellcontrolled , interfere primary objective study . Subjects may include clinically important deviation normal limit medical history , physical examination , vital sign , 12lead ECGs , clinical laboratory test result associate stable , chronic , wellcontrolled , medical condition . 3 . The estimated creatinine clearance must within ageappropriate normal range . Exclusions Criteria : 1 . Presence history disorder may prevent successful completion study . 2 . Any surgical medical condition may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion test article . 3 . Exclude subject history vascular disorder ( peripheral , coronary , venous ) , chronic inflammatory disorder ( e.g. , rheumatoid arthritis ) , hematologic disorder , bleed disorder ( e.g. , hemophilia , idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura , von willebrand ` disease ) .
